suspects.name: Marcus Thorne
suspects.personality: Ambitious and highly organized, Marcus often projects an air of calm efficiency, but beneath the surface, he harbors a deep-seated resentment towards perceived professional injustices.

physical_description.face: sharp, angular features with a perpetually serious expression
physical_description.hair: short, neatly combed dark brown hair, slightly thinning at the temples
physical_description.upper_clothing: navy blue blazer over a crisp white shirt
physical_description.distinctive_features: a habit of constantly adjusting his tie and tapping a perfectly sharpened pencil

suspects.clue_object: A perfectly sharpened pencil, almost obsessively so, which he grips tightly.
suspects.secret_motivation: Believed Elias was actively sabotaging his career advancement by undermining his projects and stealing credit for his ideas.
suspects.alibi: Claims he was working late on a critical deadline from his home office, away from the company network.

suspects.name: Lena Petrova
suspects.personality: Introverted and brilliant, Lena often seems lost in thought, preferring the logic of code to social interaction, yet she possesses a fierce loyalty to her trusted few.

physical_description.face: perpetually tired eyes behind thick, black-rimmed glasses, often smudged
physical_description.hair: messy, dark brown hair often falling across her face
physical_description.upper_clothing: charcoal grey hoodie, slightly worn at the cuffs
physical_description.distinctive_features: constantly pushing her glasses up her nose, a faint ink stain on her index finger

suspects.clue_object: A worn, dog-eared copy of a complex programming manual, its pages filled with annotations.
suspects.secret_motivation: Elias had stumbled upon her clandestine side-project, an unsanctioned AI model, which could jeopardize her employment and her precarious visa status.
suspects.alibi: Attended a late-night, private coding meetup for an open-source project across town.

suspects.name: Vivian Chen
suspects.personality: Outgoing and effortlessly charming, Vivian excels at navigating complex social and professional landscapes, but underneath her polished exterior lies a desperate need for financial stability.

physical_description.face: a practiced, engaging smile that doesn't quite reach her eyes, subtle lines of stress around them
physical_description.hair: perfectly styled, glossy blonde bob, always in place
physical_description.upper_clothing: forest green silk blouse with delicate pleats
physical_description.distinctive_features: wears an expensive, minimalist watch and frequently smooths her skirt or checks her phone

suspects.clue_object: A high-end, slightly scratched smartwatch, which she compulsively glances at.
suspects.secret_motivation: Elias was about to expose her inflated sales figures and a questionable client deal, threatening her substantial year-end bonus and her entire career.
suspects.alibi: Claims she was hosting an exclusive, late-night client dinner at a high-end restaurant downtown.

suspects.name: David Miller
suspects.personality: Seemingly calm and empathetic, David projects an air of professionalism, but he is internally stressed by the weight of corporate secrets and ethical dilemmas he's forced to navigate.

physical_description.face: a soft, worried expression, with deep-set eyes that often look burdened
physical_description.hair: short, neatly parted red hair, thinning on top
physical_description.upper_clothing: burgundy knitted cardigan over a collared beige shirt
physical_description.distinctive_features: a slight, nervous tremor in his hands, often fidgeting with a small object in his pocket

suspects.clue_object: A small, unmarked grey stress ball, squeezed rhythmically in his hand.
suspects.secret_motivation: Elias was threatening to go public with a past sexual harassment claim that the company, and David personally, had quietly suppressed, which would ruin his career and the company's reputation.
suspects.alibi: Insists he was home battling a severe migraine, having left work early.
